title: Looking for a team
body:
Hey guys, I am currently Gold 4 oceanic with slightly low MMR for my rank and am looking for a team. I mainly play support particularly thresh or jungle and particularly Vi. I am pretty decent with communications and understand rotations and ways of bringing back the game if the other people in my team maintain a positive mindset. My mechanics are semi - decent but I do think I do very well on Vi and Thresh. 

If anyone is looking for a sup main for a ranked 5's team particularly Gold or above just send me a friend request in game or reply on here.

Thanks
zPONYv

replies.body: Hey Man, We currently have an opening for a Jungler/Support in our ranked team ;) Add me. We are currently 3/0 in placements
